title: How to Use Cheats on Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX on PS2

steps.headline: All Levels: To unlock all the levels in the game you have to start a game in Pro Quest Mode and after selecting your rider, bike and style you will be highlighting the Track Selection option.
steps.description: While there press press LEFT, UP, RIGHT, DOWN, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT, UP, LEFT, Y. You will have to re-enter the code each time you change riders.

steps.headline: Play As Slim Jim: To use that wacky Slim Jim guy start a game in Pro Quest Mode and at the rider select screen press DOWN, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, UP, UP, Y.
steps.description: Now cycle through the riders and you will find Slim Jim.

steps.headline: All Bikes: All the bikes are yours but first you have to start a game in Pro Quest Mode and pick your rider.
steps.description: Next, at the bike selection option press UP, LEFT, UP, DOWN, UP, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, Y. You will have to re-enter the code each time you change riders.

steps.headline: Dave Mirra: DOWN, DOWN, DOWN: Triple Backflip
steps.description: RIGHT, UP + RIGHT, RIGHT: Double Seat Grab Superman Indian

steps.headline: Mike Laird: DOWN + RIGHT, DOWN + RIGHT, DOWN + RIGHT: Double Tailwhip No Hander
steps.description: DOWN, DOWN + RIGHT, DOWN + RIGHT: No Hander Tailwhip Backflip

steps.headline: Chad Kagy:
steps.description: UP + RIGHT, LEFT, LEFT: Double Seat Grab Superman UP + RIGHT, DOWN, DOWN: Bus Driver Super-Man

steps.headline: Harkin:
steps.description: RIGHT, LEFT, UP + RIGHT: Double Seat Grab Decade RIGHT, LEFT, DOWN: Decade Backflip

steps.headline: Leigh Ramsdell:
steps.description: RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT: One Handed Decade UP, UP, UP: Double Frontflip

steps.headline: Butler:
steps.description: DOWN, UP + RIGHT, UP + RIGHT: Seat Grab Superflip UP, LEFT, LEFT: One footed Tabletop

steps.headline: Slim Jim:
steps.description: RIGHT, UP, LEFT: Rocket No Hander Toboggan LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT: One Hander One Footer Can-Can Backflip

steps.headline: Tim Mirra: DOWN, UP, DOWN: Double Peg Grab Backflip
Ryan Nyquist:
steps.description: DOWN, DOWN, DOWN + RIGHT: No Hander Barspin Backflip RIGHT, RIGHT, UP + RIGHT: Seat Grab No Footer Can-Can

steps.headline: Joey Garcia:
steps.description: LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT: No footer One Hander Can-Can Amish Boy: LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT: Crotch Rocket Backflip

steps.headline: Exorcist mode:
steps.description: Successfully complete the game as Troy McMurray to unlock the exorcist option at the cheat screen. Successfully complete the game as the game as Troy McMurray, Mike Laird, Chad Kagy, Tim Mirra, Kenan Harkin, Shaun Butler, Leigh Ramsdell, Joey Garcia, Ryan Nyquist, and Dave Mirra.

text: All Levels: To unlock all the levels in the game you have to start a game in Pro Quest Mode and after selecting your rider, bike and style you will be highlighting the Track Selection option. While there press press LEFT, UP, RIGHT, DOWN, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT, UP, LEFT, Y. You will have to re-enter the code each time you change riders. Play As Slim Jim: To use that wacky Slim Jim guy start a game in Pro Quest Mode and at the rider select screen press DOWN, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, UP, UP, Y. Now cycle through the riders and you will find Slim Jim. All Bikes: All the bikes are yours but first you have to start a game in Pro Quest Mode and pick your rider. Next, at the bike selection option press UP, LEFT, UP, DOWN, UP, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, Y. You will have to re-enter the code each time you change riders. Dave Mirra: DOWN, DOWN, DOWN: Triple Backflip RIGHT, UP + RIGHT, RIGHT: Double Seat Grab Superman Indian Mike Laird: DOWN + RIGHT, DOWN + RIGHT, DOWN + RIGHT: Double Tailwhip No Hander DOWN, DOWN + RIGHT, DOWN + RIGHT: No Hander Tailwhip Backflip Chad Kagy: UP + RIGHT, LEFT, LEFT: Double Seat Grab Superman UP + RIGHT, DOWN, DOWN: Bus Driver Super-Man Harkin: RIGHT, LEFT, UP + RIGHT: Double Seat Grab Decade RIGHT, LEFT, DOWN: Decade Backflip Leigh Ramsdell: RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT: One Handed Decade UP, UP, UP: Double Frontflip Butler: DOWN, UP + RIGHT, UP + RIGHT: Seat Grab Superflip UP, LEFT, LEFT: One footed Tabletop Slim Jim: RIGHT, UP, LEFT: Rocket No Hander Toboggan LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT: One Hander One Footer Can-Can Backflip Tim Mirra: DOWN, UP, DOWN: Double Peg Grab Backflip  Ryan Nyquist: DOWN, DOWN, DOWN + RIGHT: No Hander Barspin Backflip RIGHT, RIGHT, UP + RIGHT: Seat Grab No Footer Can-Can Joey Garcia: LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT: No footer One Hander Can-Can Amish Boy: LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT: Crotch Rocket Backflip Exorcist mode: Successfully complete the game as Troy McMurray to unlock the exorcist option at the cheat screen. Successfully complete the game as the game as Troy McMurray, Mike Laird, Chad Kagy, Tim Mirra, Kenan Harkin, Shaun Butler, Leigh Ramsdell, Joey Garcia, Ryan Nyquist, and Dave Mirra.
